name: HTML5 RDP to Linux on Azure
author: Ben Stohon
description: Install guacamole on a linux VM running in Azure. Guacamole is a web app that provides the ability to remote desktop into machines on your network through a HTML 5 browser.

name: Dynamically Render Using Vue.js
author: Ben Stohon
description: Use vue.js to load and render new content dynamically. This is particularly useful when you would like to update the layout of your data without including the markup for the layout on the page itself.

name: PSWeb – PowerShell Web Console
author: Ben Stohon
description: PSWeb is a single page web application that lets users select PowerShell scripts to view and execute from a remote server. The user can only modify parameters of the script and then view the result in standard PowerShell format, HTML or JSON.

name: Download CSV File and Save to SQL Server
author: Ben Stohon
description: Use PowerShell to download a cvs file from a remote server and dump results into a SQL Server table using LogParser.

name: LogParser 2.2 – Query Builder – Part 2
author: Ben Stohon
description: I’m going to demonstrate building a small application in AngularJS that will provide a user friendly UI for quickly building LogParser queries.

name: LogParser 2.2 - Query Builder - Part 1
author: Ben Stohon
description: LogParser - parsing csv or tab separated files and other log file formats using a SQL like syntax.
